title: WTF is wrong with ranked matchmaking??
body:
Hii everyone,
I'm a low ranked Bronze 3 player, doing my best to improve my playing skills, but I dont understand why I am being placed in matches with no bronze players on the other team...
I'm being placed in matches with Silver-gold players, and I'm Bronze 3... How the hell does that work?

It is demoralizing when I am placed in a match with NOBODY on the other team being similar rank to me.
Not demoralizing only for me, but also for the people who have to have a shit player like me on their team of silvers and gold, against another team of silvers.
Look at these teams from last game:

sibotasu - Silver IV.
Neymar - Silver V
DeepkickerZ - Silver II.
Porateas - Silver III
VKT N3 TITAN - Silver V

My Team:
Juju Sanada - Silver IV
Katsumiii - Gold V
ManGo Cn - Silver IV
Optimus Zim - Silver V.
Me - Bronze III

How the hell is that fair on me?
How am I supposed to have a chance here?
When I am ranked Bronze 3, I expected that I would be pitted up against other bronze players, so that I could have fair matches, and learn to carry people my own level to climb the ladder.

I know, some of you might say "that gold player should be able to carry you", well that definitely wasn't the case in the game above, and that still doesn't make the game fun for me, because I can't compete fairly with people my own skill grade...

How am I supposed to climb the ladder, when I am being matched against people who are way above my skill?
Why am I being matched against/with people in silver and gold, as a bronze 3 player?
